com.symbian.commdb.xml
Class XMLUtility

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.symbian.commdb.xml.XMLUtility
public class XMLUtility
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used as a container for a number of static utility functions used for the manipulation of XML elements parsed by a DOM parser

OutputXMLNodes

public static void OutputXMLNodes(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                                  java.lang.String indent)
It sends to the console output stream a node and all its children. This method should be used for testing/debugging purposes only.

Parameters:
node - The node to output
indent - The identation string to use for the output

VectoriseChildrenNodes

public static void VectoriseChildrenNodes(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                                          java.util.Vector elements)
It creates a vector with contents all the children elements of a node (without the node itself)

Parameters:
node - The node to process
elements - The vector to use for storing the elements

VectoriseFirstChildrenNodes

public static void VectoriseFirstChildrenNodes(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                                               java.util.Vector elements)
It creates a vector with contents all the first children of a node (without the node itself)

LocateNodesFromAttribute

public static void LocateNodesFromAttribute(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                                            java.lang.String attributeName,
                                            java.util.Vector nodes)
It locates all child element of a node with a given attribute name

Parameters:
node - The node to process
attributeName - The name of the attribute to locate
nodes - The located nodes

LocateNodeAttribute

                                                   java.lang.String name)
It locates the attribute of a node given its name

Parameters:
node - The node to process
name - The name of the attribute to locate
Returns:
The located attribute
